definition: A designated physical location or area where an individual performs tasks, duties, or work-related activities. It is commonly used to refer to a specific place within an organization, such as an office, workstation, or job site, where an individual carries out their professional responsibilities.

examples.german: Er hat einen neuen Arbeitsplatz gefunden.
examples.english: He has found a new job.

examples.german: Sie arbeitet an einem ergonomischen Arbeitsplatz.
examples.english: She works at an ergonomic workstation.

examples.german: Der Arbeitsplatz befindet sich im Zentrum der Stadt.
examples.english: The workplace is located in the city center.
